summary: This document is a notice of voluntary dismissal filed in the case of Marvin Gerber and Kalma Koenig against Jeffrey E. Epstein and others. The plaintiffs are dismissing the action without prejudice, meaning they retain the right to refile in the future. The dismissal is without costs to any party.

persons.name: Marvin Gerber
persons.context: Marvin Gerber is one of the plaintiffs in the case against Jeffrey E. Epstein and others, representing himself and others similarly situated.

persons.name: Kalma Koenig
persons.context: Kalma Koenig is another plaintiff in the case against Jeffrey E. Epstein and others, representing herself and others similarly situated.

persons.name: Hillary M. Nappi
persons.context: Hillary M. Nappi is the attorney representing the plaintiffs, Marvin Gerber and Kalma Koenig, in this case.

persons.name: Frank R. Schirripa
persons.context: Frank R. Schirripa is another attorney representing the plaintiffs in this case.

persons.name: Daniel B. Rehns
persons.context: Daniel B. Rehns is also an attorney representing the plaintiffs in this case.

persons.name: Jeffrey E. Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey E. Epstein is named as one of the defendants in the case filed by Marvin Gerber and Kalma Koenig.

connections.description: Marvin Gerber and Kalma Koenig are co-plaintiffs in the case against Jeffrey E. Epstein and others.
Hillary M. Nappi represents Marvin Gerber as his attorney in the case.
Hillary M. Nappi represents Kalma Koenig as her attorney in the case.
Frank R. Schirripa is also an attorney representing Marvin Gerber in the case.
Frank R. Schirripa is also an attorney representing Kalma Koenig in the case.
Daniel B. Rehns is another attorney representing Marvin Gerber in the case.
Daniel B. Rehns is also an attorney representing Kalma Koenig in the case.

events.title: Voluntary Dismissal
events.description: Marvin Gerber and Kalma Koenig voluntarily dismissed their case against Jeffrey E. Epstein and others without prejudice.

keyFacts: Marvin Gerber and Kalma Koenig are plaintiffs in a case against Jeffrey E. Epstein and others.
The case was voluntarily dismissed without prejudice, allowing for the possibility of refiling.
Hillary M. Nappi, Frank R. Schirripa, and Daniel B. Rehns are the attorneys representing the plaintiffs.
The dismissal is without costs to any party.
The document was filed in the United States District Court for the Southern District of New York.
